onScrollStarted().Description: Invoked when the user starts dragging/flinging the drawer's handle.
onScrollStarted().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29

onScrollEnded().Description: Invoked when the user stops dragging/flinging the drawer's handle.
onScrollEnded().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29

ClassDesc: Callback invoked when the drawer is scrolled.
